d1_text:
Npc0041:
[GOTO_IF_FLAG GIYGAS_DEFEATED L_C765CF]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG TALKED_TO_ONETT_BAKERY_LADY_TWICE L_C7659C]
[GOTO_IF_FLAG TEMP_2 L_C7654C]
ï¿½I want to tell you the story of the creature from the vegetable soup,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½but I won't because I don't want to bother you with a story[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½that has nothing to do with your adventure.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½If I keep talking about unrelated stuff,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½you might start ignoring important messages.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½It's important for you to talk to people.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Also,[PAUSE 15] a person might give you a different message,[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½depending on when you speak to them.[HALT][SET_FLAG TEMP_2]
[END]
